title: THESE RUNES WILL PISS OFF THE ENEMY BOT LANE | HOW TO DEAL WITH BARD BUFF | YOU'RE WELCOME
body:
Hello my fellow Legends, Instinqt here. Patch 7.24 gave Bard a slight buff to health regeneration, and base damage increase to his meeps! The buff is actually decent, because it increased meep base damage by 10!  This buff has only done more for his poke damage, which bard is incredibly great at IF PLAYED PROPERLY.  I am a notorious Bard main, and I have continued to master this champion.  This pre season, I hold a 60% win rate, whereas Bard has a 48% win rate globally! 

How have I taken such a poor performing champion, that riot thinks needs buffs, and performed so incredibly well in comparison to others? 
I've taken time to create this video for YOU, to show you exactly how I have maintained such a high win rate on Bard this pre season.  This is a runes reforged path to victory, which I have named "Bad Guy Bard", in response to riot's "Good guy bard path".  Do not miss this opportunity to learn how strong Bard can be, and how strong the rune's I take can be!

If you aren't learning, you are falling behind! Be the Legend you were born to be, by watching this video you will gain knowledge! After all, I made the video for YOU TO WATCH. Hope you enjoy it! If you did, be sure to like, subscribe & share! I'll be making more content (videos) for our community! Without further or do, I present, Bad Guy Bard!   P.S PLEASE TAKE THE POLL ON THIS POST! THANK YOU.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7FzsV7ZRgn8

replies.body: Cool video! I will try this build.
Appreciate that! Looking forward to feedback! Be sure to share this video with all your riot co-workers!

Lol! Well it's not a scam click bait sort of thing. The video is sincere and offers a ton of information! Did you get a chance to watch the video?

this gonna be fun
Oh it's a blast. Like anything practice makes perfect, but you'll enjoy it!
I was just against a bard this morning. I hated him.

Well it wasn’t me you faced! He’s barely ever played, most people don’t know how to deal with him. My friends joke and say, “Besides playing with you, I’ve only seen Bard in the rift a hand full of times”
Yo, I caught that video the other day and loved it. Thanks for the info, I plan on trying out some of the strats you use once I get my internet stable.
Hey appreciate the feedback! Glad you loved the video, I look forward to hearing back from ya once you try it!

Will playing bard like this allow me to buy that car?

I was told getting diamond would get me a beautiful girl, but that didn't pan out, and now I'm wary of advice from strangers.

Haha! No, playing Bard like this will not get you a car like that. If that were the case, I think more people would be playing the champion ^^.
Your girl is on the way bro, stay woke. Be on the lookout
Caught the video the other day, decided to give it a try. 4/4/30. Don't even play bard that much, but was fun af. Will try again.
Right on, that's awesome I'm glad you tried it and had such great success!
I think electrocute is better as q aa will still proc it just like thunderlords, has better damage and doesn't needto snowball as much to be effective, other then that it's a nice page.

I’ve taken electrocute, I enjoyed it. HOWEVER, the cooldown on it is lengthy. Supports level slowly, and so the CD remains heavy all game long on it. Also, it only deals more damage then dark harvest early game. After -15 minutes harvest already should have more damage.
